author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Ex-FDA chief says U.S. likely won't have broad-based coronavirus testing until September
description: Former Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said Monday that the U.S. likely won’t have broad-based testing for the coronavirus in place until September.
content:
WASHINGTON Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said Monday that the U.S. likely wont have broad-based testing for the coronavirus in place until September.
We're not going to be there. We're not going to be there in May, we're not going to be there in Jun… [+2052 chars]
